full_output.summary: Dynamic and motivated pre-final year undergraduate student pursuing a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE). Eager to apply theoretical knowledge and practical skills in a challenging and rewarding internship or entry-level position.

education.school: Board Of Secondary Education Andhra Pradesh

projects.name: Gym Management System
projects.description: Created Gym Management System by utilisng the concepts of object-oriented Programming in c++ and File Handling was used efficiently. Implemented for students to book slots in gym according to their preferences.

projects.name: Currency Converter
projects.description: This project Currency Converter is used to convert the money like Indian Rupees to American Dollar or Indian Rupees to european Euro. Currency Converter is a calculator or a software or a tool that converts quantity or value of one currency into the relative quantities or values of other.

projects.name: Bus Reservation System
projects.description: Implemented a bus reservation system in C, allowing booking and displaying passenger details. Utilized structs to represent passengers and the bus,with functionality to book seats and display a passenger list.

experiences.description: Throughout my internship,I acquired practical experience utilising the Django frameworks db.sqlite3 relational database, efficiently handling and modifying backend data to guarantee the un- interrupted operation of web applications.Utilized HTML,CSS,and Javascript to create responsive and interactive web pages.
